summary.value: A graceful symbol of serenity and wisdom.

effects.effect:
You are immune to dazed and slow.

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.Ki4ReDF50Qs3Ec4B e:eot i:2 t:source]{Dazed Immunity} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.QWbVVZRRKhxwjQAp e:eot i:2 t:source]{Slow Immunity}

You treat your Dexterity and Insight as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.vv2cqUDHaCJLmEYw e:eot i:1 t:source]{DEX Up} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.4G5iaieFDwGiIVrw e:eot i:1 t:source]{INS Up}

You and every ally you can see treat your Dexterity and Insight as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

Targets Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.vv2cqUDHaCJLmEYw e:eot i:1 t:source]{DEX Up} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.4G5iaieFDwGiIVrw e:eot i:1 t:source]{INS Up}
